casebody.data:
Submitted March 27, affirmed April 24, 2013 STATE OF OREGON, Plaintiff-Respondent, v. BENJAMIN CRUZ, Defendant-Appellant.

Washington County Circuit Court

C111731CR; A150146 300 P3d 309 Peter Gartlan, Chief Defender, and Andrew D. Robinson, Deputy Public Defender, Office of Public Defense Services, filed the brief for appellant. Ellen F. Rosenblum, Attorney General, Anna M. Joyce, Solicitor General, and Doug M. Petrina, Senior Assistant Attorney General, filed the brief for respondent. PER CURIAM

Before Ortega, Presiding Judge, and Sercombe, Judge, and Hadlock, Judge.
